headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Microchip Technology (MCHP) After Its Strong 1 Year Share Price Run?
summary: If you are wondering whether Microchip Technology is attractively priced today, it helps to step back and look at what the recent share performance and fundamentals are actually telling you. The stock last closed at US$80.28, with returns of 5.4% over 7 days, 24.2% over 30 days, 23.5% year to date, 47.8% over 1 year, 6.4% over 3 years and 26.9% over 5 years. This gives you a snapshot of how sentiment around the company has shifted across different time frames. Recent headlines around...

headline: PIC32CM PL10 MCUs Expand Microchip’s Arm® Cortex®-M0+ Portfolio
summary: Low-power, 5V-capable devices deliver high performance while preserving low system complexity and costsCHANDLER, Ariz., Jan. 29, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Building on decades of experience in serving embedded applications where low power, affordability and ease of development are critical, Microchip Technology (Nasdaq: MCHP) has added PIC32CM PL10 MCUs to its PIC32C family of Arm® Cortex®-M0+ core devices.
